title: Netherbrick
desc:
Post 1943
- When stood on, you gain a Nether point for every card you draw.
 - If you have 2 Nether points, you can spend them to draw a random **Ethereal** <:gloom:1187518684143550605> card.
- This card is of the Stone subtype.
- This card takes 3 hits to break with a tool that is not meant for it.
